## 🔢 Key Metrics Extracted

### Internal Performance
- **Accuracy:** 96.2%
- **Macro-F1:** 95.9%
- **ECE:** 0.048
- **Log Loss:** 0.168

### External Validation
- **Baseline Accuracy:** 72.3%
- **Baseline Macro-F1:** 67.5%
- **Adapted Accuracy:** 77.9%
- **Adapted Macro-F1:** 78.4%
- **Glioma Recall:** 23% → 58% (improvement!)

### Efficiency Metrics
- **Parameters:** 2.22M
- **FLOPs:** 305.73 MFLOPs
- **Model Size:** 8.52 MB
- **CPU Latency:** 21.9±2.4 ms
- **Throughput:** 45.7 IPS
